transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
(silence)
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Meeru maatlaadutunna vyakti mee call nu hold lo unchaaru. Dayachesi line lo vechi undandi. Aap jis vyakti
(silence)
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello ma'am.
Executive: Hello ma'am, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Ek minute, aana aa raha tha.
Customer: Yeah. Regarding that, regarding that credit note, whether the amount was credited or the process was going on.
Executive: Amount was yet not credited. I sent you an email that you will get the amount in seven to eight working days.
Customer: Yeah. We have a little bit confusion on that because you said credit note. Today credit note is created. So by tomorrow, most probably by tomorrow or by Monday, you will get the amount.
Customer: Okay. Yeah, today only credit note was came to my email.
Executive: When the credit note will get generated, after that only you will get the refundable amount, ma'am.
Customer: Okay, okay. We have confusion on that. So we didn't understand whether the money was credited or money was not credited. So because of that we again mailed for you.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: So again a complaint is raised.
Customer: Again.
Executive: Yes, a complaint is raised again. So can I proceed to close that complaint?
Customer: Ha, okay, okay, close that, close that.
Executive: Okay. By tomorrow or by Monday, hopefully you will get the amount.
Customer: Okay. At the time also you will send any email?
Executive: Yesterday, yesterday only I sent the email. You can check it by my name, by name of Richa, you can check my email.
Customer: Like you are saying like that tomorrow or Monday the money will credited. So how will you show the proof?
Executive: I mentioned in email.
Customer: Sorry.
Customer: How will you send that amount was credited? Like through email only, no?
Executive: Yes, you will get an email or you can check your account. You will be getting the acknowledgement on the payment on email or you can check your account also as well as. So you will inform us.
Customer: Adhi she appudu PhonePe Google Pay nunchi kada manam chesina mana number lo details emi lenappudu ela pampistaaru vaallu? Adhi adugu.
Customer: Aah.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes ma'am.
Customer: Hello ma'am.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: On that day when starting of Universal Act Technology, we sent money through PhonePe. Like it's a number.
Executive: You have done payment through UPI, right?
Customer: Aah.
Executive: UPI.
Customer: Aah, through UPI ID.
Executive: Yeah, so UPI must be done through some account, na?
Customer: Yeah, on that day only phone number, no, from PhonePe we did the we debited the amount.
Executive: Alright, let me confirm, ma'am. Let me confirm, ma'am. How will you get the acknowledgement? I will confirm you once and I will update you.
Customer: Give some any like where you will send, where you will credit that money? Like through UPI ID or through bank account? Because you didn't do any bank account. On that day we debited the account through only PhonePe, like through number. So how can you just credit the number? So give that some details.
Executive: It's alright, I will check it and update you.
Customer: Yeah, okay.
Executive: Okay. Thank you. Thank you, ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Regarding credit note, amount not credited yet.

- How will the refund be credited?



Resolution:

- Amount will be credited by Monday.

- Executive will check and update the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and update the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- credit note, refund, upi, phonepe
